attributes.action: Reduce the increase in the renewal fee for an SIA Licence, to no more than inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the SIA Licence was first introduced, it cost £195.

Three years down the line, and the first renewal is £245, which is more than a 25% increase.

Given that inflation is (or so we are told) less than 4%, 25% (even over 3 years) is unfair.

A fairer figure would be about £210.
